name: @cycle/http
description: A Cycle.js Driver for making HTTP requests

scripts.test-browser: npm run start-test-support-server && ../node_modules/.bin/testem ci -l Chrome,Firefox && npm run stop-test-support-server
scripts.stop-test-support-server: if ps -p $(cat test-support-server.pid)> /dev/null; then kill -KILL $(cat test-support-server.pid); fi && rm test-support-server.pid
scripts.test-ci: npm run lib && npm run lint && npm run test-node && npm run start-test-support-server && ../node_modules/.bin/testem ci && npm run stop-test-support-server
scripts.test: npm run lib && npm run lint && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.browserify: npm run lib && ../node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/index.js --global-transform=browserify-shim --standalone CycleHTTPDriver --exclude xstream --outfile dist/cycle-http-driver.js
scripts.dist: npm run lib && npm run browserify && npm run uglify
scripts.version: npm run dist && npm run readme && npm run changelog
scripts.postversion: git add -A && git commit -m "release(${PWD##*/}): v$(cat package.json | ../node_modules/.bin/jase version)" && git push origin master && npm publish
